text: Robin David Segal, better known as Robby Benson (born September 9, 1955) is an American actor. He is known for providing the voice of the Beast in the 1991 animated movie Beauty and the Beast and its numerous sequels and spin-offs. In 1975 Benson auditioned for the role of Luke Skywalker in Star Wars but it eventually went to Mark Hamill. == Other websites == * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:American child actors Category:Actors from Dallas
